title: CadValidationEngine Geometry Validation Audit
verdict: PASS - No standalone CadValidationEngine. CAD logic distributed across cadDispatcher (12 actions) and L2 engine (5 cad_* actions)

distributed_across.note: L2 CAD layer provides lower-level geometry operations

geometry_validation_coverage.feature_recognition: feature_recognize — identifies machining features from geometry
geometry_validation_coverage.geometry_analysis: geometry_analyze — validates geometry properties and manufacturability
geometry_validation_coverage.stock_model: stock_model — raw stock to finished part comparison

manufacturability_assessment.feature_based: feature_recognize identifies features and their machinability
manufacturability_assessment.geometry_based: geometry_analyze checks for thin walls, deep pockets, tight radii
manufacturability_assessment.tool_accessibility: Implicit via feature recognition + 5-axis work envelope
